title: Riverboat heritage
creator_credit: Brad Smart, Russell Hurley and Russell Hurley Film Productions
brief_description: Provides a comprehensive chronological history of the riverboats that travelled the major rivers, particularly the Murray. Portrays the transportation of supplies to inland farmers and goldseekers and the transportation of farm products to the markets of yesteryear. to the service of the tourist trade of today. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
